  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Up from the Street: Tommy Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herauf von die Straße: Tommy Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À partir de la rue : Tommy Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acima da rua: Tommy Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalla via: Tommy Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επάνω από την οδό: Θ*Τομμυ Guerrero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encima de la calle: Tommy Guerrero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK meets Tommy Guerrero, world famous street skateboarder and musician, whose music evokes the sounds and rhythms of San Francisco. This Educator Guide is about street culture in San Francisco, including skateboarding and its culture, as well as contemporary, instrumental music.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN trifft Tommy Guerrero, Weltberühmtes 
Straße skateboarder und Musiker, dessen Musik die Töne und die 
Rhythmen von San Francisco erwähnt. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung 
ist über Straße Kultur in San Francisco, einschließlich das 
Skateboarding und seine Kultur, sowie Zeitgenossen, instrumentelle 
Musik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE rencontre Tommy Guerrero, 
skateboarder de rue du monde et musicien célèbres, dont la musique 
évoque les bruits et les rythmes de San Francisco. Ce guide 
d'éducateur est au sujet de culture de rue dans San Francisco, y 
compris skateboarding et sa culture, aussi bien que le contemporain, 
musique instrumentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA encontra-se com Tommy Guerrero, o 
skateboarder da rua do mundo e o músico famosos, cuja a música 
evokes os sons e os ritmos de San Francisco. Esta guia do 
educador é sobre a cultura da rua em San Francisco, including 
skateboarding e sua cultura, as.well.as o comtemporâneo, música 
instrumental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA viene a contatto di Tommy Guerrero, 
dello skateboarder della via del mondo e del musicista famosi, di 
cui la musica evoca i suoni ed i ritmi di San Francisco. Questa 
guida dell'educatore è circa la coltura della via a San Francisco, 
compresi skateboarding e la relativa coltura, così come il 
contemporaneo, musica strumentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ συναντά τον Tommy Guerrero, την 
παγκόσμια διάσημη οδό skateboarder και το μουσικό, η ο οποίος 
μουσική προκαλεί τους ήχους και τους ρυθμούς του Σαν Φρανσίσκο. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για τον πολιτισμό οδών 
στο Σαν Φρανσίσκο, συμπεριλαμβανομένου να κάνει σκέιτ μπορντ και 
του πολιτισμού του, καθώς επίσης και τη σύγχρονη, οργανική 
μουσική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA satisface a Tommy Guerrero, al 
skateboarder de la calle del mundo y a músico famosos, que música 
evoca los sonidos y los ritmos de San Francisco. Esta guía del 
educador está sobre cultura de la calle en San Francisco, incluyendo 
skateboarding y su cultura, así como contemporáneo, música 
instrumental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
